definition: to scald/to burn (by scalding)/to blanch (cooking)/to heat (sth) up in hot water/to perm/to iron/scalding hot
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: I was going to perm my hair today.
sentences.chinese: 我今天本來要去燙頭髮的。

sentences.english: I made an appointment for a perm.
Why can't I perm my hair if I am not working?
sentences.chinese: 你想想你要沒工作就更不能燙頭髮，這麼想心就平。

sentences.english: Mary is at the beauty salon getting a perm.
sentences.chinese: 瑪莉在美容沙龍燙頭髮。

sentences.english: Today, I was reading a magazine while straightening my hair.
sentences.chinese: 今天我在燙頭髮的時候看雜誌看的入了迷。

sentences.english: Do you want a perm like you had last time?
sentences.chinese: 您要不要跟上一次一樣燙頭髮？

sentences.english: I made an appointment for a perm at 00.
My hair looks deadly flat. I'd like to have a perm today.
sentences.chinese: 我的頭髮看起來好塌，我今天想燙頭髮。

definition: half a life/only half alive/barely alive/(scared, beaten etc) half to death
Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: lit. to swell one's face up by slapping it to look imposing (idiom); to seek to impress by feigning more than one's abilities
pinyin: da3 zhong3 lian3 chong1 pang4 zi5

definition: see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
lit. a good horse doesn't turn around and graze the same patch again (idiom)/fig. once you've moved on, don't go back again (romantic relationship, job etc)/leave the past behind
pinyin: hao3 ma3 bu4 chi1 hui2 tou2 cao3
